    • save

      public void save(Consumer<net.minecraft.data.recipes.FinishedRecipe> consumer, String id)
      Saves the recipe
      Parameters:
      consumer - the recipe consumer
      id - the id / name of the recipe - asks for a String. It will create a ResourceLocation with modid mhm_bitsnbobs and the id.
